missions.Title: Rescue Mission
missions.Description: Rescue a stranded astronaut on a rogue asteroid.
Dialogue: Commander, we’ve received a distress signal from the outer asteroid belt.
There’s a lone astronaut stranded out there.

missions.Title: Cargo Delivery
missions.Description: Deliver essential supplies to a starving outpost.
Dialogue: The Hadrin Outpost is on the brink of collapse.
We need someone dependable to get these supplies through.

missions.Title: Anomaly Scan
missions.Description: Investigate an unusual energy reading near a derelict station.
Dialogue: An anomaly has appeared in sector 9-B.
Document everything and bring back samples.

missions.Title: Bounty Hunt
missions.Description: Track and eliminate the pirate Lorik Kane.
Dialogue: Lorik Kane has eluded us for years.
He’s resurfaced near the border fringe.
Bring me his ship. Wrecked or intact.

missions.Title: Research Recovery
missions.Description: Recover stolen data from a compromised lab.
Dialogue: A black ops team hit our deep-lab near Soras IV.
They took everything and left traps behind.
Recover the drives. And don’t get caught.
